snippet: Kareem Thomas, who had appeared in court earlier in the day in an attempted murder case, was shot after a car and foot chase in the Crown Heights neighborhood, the authorities said.
abstract: New York City police officials report uniformed police officer, whose identity is not revealed, shot Kareem Thomas after car chase through Crown Heights neighborhood; Thomas, who had appeared in State Supreme Court in Brooklyn fighting attempted murder charge earlier in day, is said to have exited his vehicle, after crashing car, with gun in hand.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and ELI ROSENBERG

lead_paragraph: Kareem Thomas, who had appeared in court earlier in the day in an attempted murder case, was shot after a car and foot chase in the Crown Heights neighborhood, the authorities said.

headline.main: Officer Shoots Man Reaching for Gun After Chase in Brooklyn, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Officer Shoots Man in Brooklyn Chase
